title: XRP ETF Approval Likely Near 100%, Reveals Market Veteran
summary: Experts predict that an XRP ETF could be approved as soon as 2025. This would make it easier for investors to gain exposure to Ripple's digital asset. Stay tune

body.raw:
Experts predict that an XRP ETF could be approved as soon as 2025. This would make it easier for investors to gain exposure to Ripple's digital asset. Stay tuned for updates on this potential game-changing development in the world of crypto investments.

---

**Original Article:** [U.Today - IT, AI and Fintech Daily News for You Today](https://u.today/xrp-etf-approval-likely-near-100-reveals-market-veteran)

*This article was originally published on [U.Today - IT, AI and Fintech Daily News for You Today](https://u.today/xrp-etf-approval-likely-near-100-reveals-market-veteran) and has been curated for our readers.*
